Payment Info:
We accept payment through PayPal. You can use any major credit card or checking/bank account through the PayPal system. We don’t accept any other method of payment besides PayPal. Please follow the eBay checkout system to pay us securely once you have completed your purchases. For any questions, please use eBay's "Ask Seller a Question" link at the bottom of the listing.
 Return Policy:
Your satisfaction is our priority, so we offer a simple 30 Day Money-Back Guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied with your jewelry, simply send it back to us (including all original packaging) within 30 days and we will issue you all refund of your purchase. Our returns department will process and inspect your returned items for signs of wear (please make sure they still look brand new), and will promptly issue a PayPal refund within 7 days. Please contact us if you would like to initiate a return, so that we may guide you through the process. We can be reached through the "Ask Seller a Question" link on the listing. In the unlikely event that your jewelry arrives broken or damaged, rest assured that we will promptly issue a replacement or full refund (whichever you prefer).
 Have Questions?

If you have any questions about our products or your order please feel free to contact us through eBay's "Ask Seller a Question" link at the bottom of the listing. We will try our best to reply as soon as possible, usually within 24 hours or less
